concept.title: Example of a customized VOD asset

conbody.p: Here is an example of a customized VOD asset:
Your application could set up the following scenarios:

ul.li: A notification when #EXT-X-ASSET tags, or any other set of custom tag names to which you have subscribed, exist in the file.
Insert ads when an #EXT-X-AD tag, or any other custom tag name, is found in the stream.
